Brief and fashion Design:The small speaker is a good gift Choice for Birthday/Mothers'day/Fathers'day,Children's Day and Christmas day.it is little and exquisite,features a stylish transparent body with loudspeaker in front, bass raditor in the back,and high-quality components inside of the portable speaker can be seen clearly, shedding elegant and pretty temperament.

Easy to Carry: The portable bluetooth speaker is designed in 5.9ounce light weight and L2.6"*H2.6"*D1.57" compact size,and also equipped with a sturdy lanyard, you can bring it with you conveniently,such as put in or hang on the little gay with your handbag,backpack

Multi Playback Modes: The wireless speaker supports bluetooth wireless connection with your bluetooth device,such as your cellphone ,pad ,tablet,also supports TF card playack mode,and require 32GB capacity TF card, MP3 Format audio.

Support Two Speakers Play in Sync: You can pair two A01 mini speakers by the True Wireless Stereo function first, then pair the small speaker to your bluetooth device Smartphone/ipad/tablet on bluetooth playback mode for louder and better listening experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LENRUE A01 mini bluetooth speaker ,portable wireless speaker for home/outdoor Wireless Bluetooth Version:5.3 Operating range:33feet Audio output:5W Power Input:DC 5V/1A Noise Ratio:≥90dB Distortion Rate:≤1% Frequency Response:120Hz-20KHz Interface:Type-C charging port Speaker Size:65x65x40mm Weight:166g

How to connect two speaker play in sync?(TWS) 1.Turn on two A01 Speakers 2.Disconnect all device with the speakerinclude bluetooth and TF card 3.Double-click the power button on either speaker to connect two speakers wirelessly 4.Pair A01 to your bluetooth device 5.Play music on your device. Why can't connenct two speakers in sync? 1.Please check the two speaker are all disconnected with all device include bluetooth and TF card. 2.The two speakers will connect wirelessly with prompt in few second,and with blue flashing light of one speaker becomes steady.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too good to be true!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I started to look for cheap alternatives but I saw this one and went for it. My God.... many good thins, starting for the low price, the modern look, great fidelity sound, the bass on the back side is great, the colors, the sd card access. The battery life is not that much however you can connect to c-type and go for it. This is indeed a great product with an excellent price.

reviews.reviewText: Really great for the size. Handy to upload audio in a microSDcard and install into this unit. Fall asleep to it, or use it as background study music. Install the audio Bible of your tech savy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quit Frankly, I’m thrilled!
reviews.reviewText: Update: 2/8/24. it has a very short battery life & the rudest noise that it makes when the battery is running tho. As noted in my review below, I use these speakers under my pillow on an hour timer on my iPhone. It lasted about 3 hours; I’m guessing. My many previous speakers, lasted days longer b4 a charge was needed. However recharging often is not the problem. My other speakers just quit quietly, which is a much preferred notice than the horrendous screeching sound that I got from this one. I could not comprehend what was happening at first. I will keep this one & will probably order another for that unbelievable good price. This is just a WARNING, so be prepared. I can’t believe no one even thought to mention this in all the reviews‼️For once in my life, & I have been around a pretty long time, I’m speechless as to how I was able to find a speaker at such an unbelievably good price & it actually works⁉️ it’s cute & little & it took me a little longer to sync because I couldn’t find the instructions. Tho I have been thru “mannnny” of these little speakers at different price points, I was amazed. I Have been sleeping with little speakers under my pillow for many years & this one worked great. I’ve had little speakers at 3 times more than this that didn’t even sync & I was stuck with it because it was a backup for another speaker; Exactly the same type.. So all I can say at this point is wow! How do you do it & with free prime shipping⁉️ thank you,‼️I’ll update on how long it actually lasts; From 2-5-24 till ⁉️🤗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't let its size deceive you
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute little speaker that is easy to carry around in your pocket. You may be inclined to believe that this doesn't sound very loud based on its looks. However, for the size, the sound is quite clear and loud. Pairing it with my phone over Bluetooth was no hassle. The battery life is quite good as I've only had to charge it once thus far. One of the sides shows the internal circuit boards which is just a nice cool touch. If you're on the look out for some cheap, tiny speakers, I'd highly recommend getting this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A tiny Bluetooth portable speaker that sounds WAY bigger!
reviews.reviewText: This is actually a VERY nice sounding little Bluetooth portable speaker that has FAR bigger sound than what you would expect for it's really small size. It has a small, round active driver on the front of it and what appears to likely be an oblong passive radiator on the back to help all additional low-frequency response. All in all, the sound comes out great and you would be easily fooled into thinking that it was coming from a much larger speaker. There is a clearly plastic/Lucite cover on the top of the speaker that shows the mainboard for the device. Although this isn't really necessary, if you are the techie type it's really nice to be able to see the "motherboard" for the device through the top of the case. According to the specs, this device is running on the latest 5.3 version of the Bluetooth standard, which is nice. You can buy a second one and have the devices present a stereo sound if you like. If you are looking for a REALLY small portable Bluetooth speaker with a USB-C charging port and a micro-SD/TF card slot (for 32GB or smaller cards, MP3 and WAV file formats supported), this is certainly one worth considering. It's really small so it certainly can't get incredibly loud, but it puts out more than enough volume for personal listening in an average sized room. Highly recommended. Great little speaker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Loud
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is very cute. It has a clear case so you can see the mechanism inside. It's small enough to fit in your pocket, but loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shockingly good sound in a tiny package!
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is so tiny! Its like a 2.5" cube! The exterior is a clear plastic so you can see the chips inside which gives it a very sophisticated look. Its size makes it extremely portable. Its only weakness in durability is the exposed speaker cones. Those in general react badly to being mishandled so keeping the box for transport is a good idea. I actually just 3D printed a travel case.The speaker gives crisp highs and surprisingly rumbly lows. You are not going to blast it and shake any windows, but it is perfectly good for listening to music in my office or in a conference room. I listened to an amazing sounding metal album and a surprisingly crisp punk album. Classical is absolutely beautiful. Surprisingly the only mushiness i heard was on some mids from a Mazzy Star album... Not sure what happened there.Battery life is very good. It lasts many hours before needing a charge. i do want to grumble about the led light here. Its blue for pairing and red for charging. But nothing for when it is done charging. It'd be nice if it was green when full or even flashing while charging and solid when full. But this is a cranky complaint for something that works as well as it does.i would definitely recommend buying it.
